participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, Emily often finds joy in expressing herself through music. She is also sensitive, which makes her highly aware of her feelings and the feelings of others.
participant_1.background: I was raised by my single mother, and she did a great job. I have a harsh inner critic. I like fantasizing. I'm a singer, although my asthma limits my singing to solos. I can't be a sniper in the army if I'm blind.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is practical and inventive, always looking for new ways to combine his interests in technology and nature. He is also family-oriented and values his connections with loved ones.
participant_2.background: I got my finger crushed in a machine when I was working at the factory. I was raised by my single mother, and she did a great job. My family is important to me, but my job is demanding and I don't always get to see them as much as I would like. I'm single, but I'd love to find someone to share my love of nature with. I spend my free time tinkering with new cellphone app ideas.

content.text: Hey, how are you today?
Good, thank you! How about you?
I'm doing well!
That's great to hear!
What did you do today?
Not much, just worked on a few new app ideas. I'm trying to see if I can get one published.
Oh, that's cool! What kind of apps are you working on?
I'm working on a few different kinds, but one is for hiking. It's supposed to help you find the best trails and give you information about them.
That's a great idea! I love hiking.
Thanks! I'm glad you think so.
So, what's your favorite thing about nature?
I think it's the peace and quiet. It's nice to be able to get away from everything and just relax.
I agree. I love going for walks in the woods.
Me too! It's so peaceful.
So, what do you do for a living?
I work at a factory.
Oh, cool! What kind of factory?
It's a machine shop.
Oh, that's cool. I've always been interested in working in a machine shop.
It's not bad. It can be pretty demanding, but it's a good job.
Yeah, I bet it can be.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to sing, play guitar, and go hiking.
That's cool! I like to sing too.
Yeah, I love singing. It's so much fun.
Me too! I'm not very good at it, but I still enjoy it.
I'm sure you're better than you think.
Thanks, I think so too.
